channel.title: json on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in json on Morgoth

item.title: Json
item.description: JSON http://www.json.org/ JSON: JavaScript Object Notation. json有两种数据结构. key-value/键值对 { key: value, key1: value1, ... } 列表/数组 [value, value1, ...] 数据类型 bool: python -> True/False go -> true/false string: > 只能用双引号. python -> str go
